content: twistin the night away 15 needle i used double pointed blue sky alpaca bulky 1 skein 45 yds gauge 8 0 sts = 4 finished headband is 19 around 4 wide child finished is 15-16 & 3 wide adult size osfa *child 2-6 years cast on 14 sts *child size cast on 10 sts row 1 k2 p2 repeat to end row 2 p2 k2 repeat to end repeat till 7-7 5 *5 5-6 depending on head size about 20-22 row row 3 after you did the 7 *5 5-6 k2 p2 k2 k2 p2 you place these stitches on holder or just leave on needle cast off 2 sts k2 p2 k2 k2 p2 continue the pattern on these 6 sts *4 till piece measures 4 *3 place on holder or just leave on needle break yarn leaving a 6 tail you use this to tack down the twist pick up 6 *4 sts from holder and continue in rib k2 p2 as the other side after you done have the 6 *4 sts on a separate needle so you can cross them over each other heres why i like the dp cross the 6 sts *4 across the other 6 *4 sts work the 1st 6 *4 sts in pattern then cast on 2 sts and work the next 6 *4 sts in pattern total of 14 *10 sts continue in pattern till same as other side 7-7 5 *5 5_6 cast off and sew cast on end to cast off to use a thinner yarn cast on in sets of 4 18 22 26 etc and work same your going to have even # of sts on each side when you cast off the 2 sts in the middle 8 10 12 etc ©2011 by susan menashe please don t sell pattern for private use only thanks
